ext_weather.name: Today
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy, with a high near 65. Northeast wind around 30 mph, with gusts as high as 50 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
